title: 6.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
1. Create a DataFrame from the safe drinking water dataset containing the percentage of the population with limited access to drinking water in South American countries with a GDP greater than 5000 Million US Dollars.
2. Create another DataFrame containing the percentage of the population that has access to safely managed drinking water in Asian countries with a total population of less than 100000.
3. Merge the two DataFrames created above and display the resulting DataFrame after removing the missing values, if any.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
